about.paragraph1: I'm Cezar Araujo, an electrical engineer with over 7 years of experience in the civil construction industry. I specialize in designing and managing electrical systems — from low-voltage installations to automation and substation projects.
about.paragraph2: My work combines technical accuracy with hands-on execution, always focused on delivering quality, cost-efficient results. I thrive in environments that demand clear communication, critical thinking, and a proactive mindset.
